item.title: Matt add a quote by Don DeLillo
item.description: "California deserves whatever it gets. Californians invented the concept of life-style. This alone warrants their doom." -- Don DeLillo

item.title: Matt add a quote by Don DeLillo
item.description: "The nonbelievers need the believers. They are desperate to have someone believe." "As belief shrinks from the world, people find it more necessary than ever that someone believe...Those who have abandoned belief must still believe in us. They are sure that they are right not to believe but they know belief must not fade completely. Hell is when no one believes." -- Don DeLillo

item.title: Matt add a quote by Don DeLillo
item.description: "When I read obituaries I always note the age of the deceased. Automatically I relate this figure to my own age. Four years to go, I think. Nine more years. Two years and I'm dead. The power of numbers is never more evident than when we use them to speculate on the time of our dying." -- Don DeLillo

item.title: Matt add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "What I say is, a town isn't a town without a bookstore. It may call itself a town, but unless it's got a bookstore it knows it's not fooling a soul." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Matt add a quote by Grant Morrison
item.description: "Metaphor is one of a group of problem-solving medicines known as figures of speech which are normally used to treat literal thinking and other diseases." -- Grant Morrison

item.title: Matt add a quote by Grant Morrison
item.description: "This is the end of our sentence" -- Grant Morrison

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description:
"Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it. If nothing within you stays rigid, outward things will disclose themselves.
Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Matt add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one" -- Bruce Lee
